about_the_game:
A character pack for Dimension Quest Pinball featuring Madrillda and Casey!

MADRILLDA

Madrillda wields the power of the Air Drill Dash and some armor piercing strength! The Air Drill Dash allows you to expend 1000 points to launch in a direction of your choice, and if used properly you could keep a combo going across entire chapters! Take her for a spin on her own adventure as she tests her might against Team Villain!

CASEY

Casey meanwhile has laser vision, allowing her to use 900 points to fire out powerful laser blasts all around her! Charge it up for more and more damage, then let it rip at just the right time for stylish KOs that net you tons of extra points! Follow her on a journey to learn about the powers of Team Villain and prove who's the greatest inventor!
